# Welcome {.unnumbered}


::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

:::


::: {.callout-important}
You are reading the work-in-progress of this thesis. This chapter is currently a dumping ground for ideas, and I don't recommend reading it.
:::


This is the web version of the master's thesis titled _Ecology of Sleep and Circadian Phenotypes of the Brazilian Population_. The printed version will soon be available at [teses.usp.br](https://teses.usp.br/).

The analyses contained in this thesis are 100% reproducible. They were performed using the [R programming language](https://www.r-project.org/) and the  [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) publishing system (an evolution of the [R Markdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/) system). Click on the GitHub icon in the menu to access the thesis code repository.

## Citation

For attribution, please cite this work as:

```
Vartanian, D. (2023). Ecology of sleep and circadian phenotypes of the 
Brazilian population [Master's thesis]. School of Arts, Sciences and Humanities,
University of Sao Paulo, São Paulo. https://danielvartan.github.io/mastersthesis/
```

BibTeX citation:

```
@mastersthesis{vartanian_2023,
  title = {Ecology of sleep and circadian phenotypes of the Brazilian population},
  author = {Daniel Vartanian},
  year = {2023},
  address = {São Paulo},
  school  = {University of Sao Paulo},
  langid = {portuguese},
  url = {https://danielvartan.github.io/mastersthesis/},
}
```
